value.stringValue:
if(Year([Course_Run__c].Start_Date__c) != Year([Course_Run__c].End_Date__c ), [Course_Run__c].Course_Run_Start_Date_Month__c & " " & Text(Day([Course_Run__c].Start_Date__c)) & ", " & Text(Year([Course_Run__c].Start_Date__c)) & " - " & [Course_Run__c].Course_Run_End_Date_Month__c & " " & Text(Day([Course_Run__c].End_Date__c)) & ", " & Text(Year([Course_Run__c].End_Date__c)),
if(Month([Course_Run__c].Start_Date__c) != Month([Course_Run__c].End_Date__c ), [Course_Run__c].Course_Run_Start_Date_Month__c & " " & Text(Day([Course_Run__c].Start_Date__c)) & " - " & [Course_Run__c].Course_Run_End_Date_Month__c & " " & Text(Day([Course_Run__c].End_Date__c)) & ", " & Text(Year([Course_Run__c].Start_Date__c)),
if([Course_Run__c].Start_Date__c == [Course_Run__c].End_Date__c,
[Course_Run__c].Course_Run_Start_Date_Month__c & " " & Text(Day([Course_Run__c].Start_Date__c)) & ", " & Text(Year([Course_Run__c].Start_Date__c)),
[Course_Run__c].Course_Run_Start_Date_Month__c & " " & Text(Day([Course_Run__c].Start_Date__c)) & " - " & Text(Day([Course_Run__c].End_Date__c)) & ", " & Text(Year([Course_Run__c].Start_Date__c)))))
